text: I’m a Software Engineer and Master’s candidate specializing in cybersecurity, graduating in June 2025. I’ve always loved tackling tough problems and finding creative, thoughtful solutions—especially when it means learning something new along the way. Whether I’m building secure systems, mentoring others, or collaborating on meaningful projects, I’m driven by curiosity and a genuine excitement for growth. Welcome to my little corner of the internet—I’m glad you’re here! If anything sparks your interest, I’d love to connect and chat more.
